title: "Deep learning uses stream discharge to estimate watershed subsurface permeability"
excerpt: "Subsurface permeability is a key parameter that controls the contribution of the subsurface flow to stream flows in watershed models. Directly measuring permeability at the spatial extent and resolution required by watershed models is difficult and expensive."
